name: Mad Planter
description:
The scientist tries to build his garden of super plants, but suddenly his plants are attacked by vegan zombies! 

The old scientist is too weak to fight, but his plants can fight for him.

Can you help him defend his garden?

Controls:

  • Left Click plants to water them. Only watered plants will grow into Super Plants.
  • Hold the Left Mouse Button to pick up a plant and carry it to a different place
  • Again don't forget to keep your plants watered. Otherwise they can't defend themself.
  • After defeating Zombies you can buy more plants.
